name: Nibbler (itch) (LordOlimar)
description:
Modern version of the classic Nibbler arcade game

Guide the NBLR-2891 through a series of mazes on alien planets, gathering research samples for study. Make sure you don't crash!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - move

Producer:

-Jungmin Kim

Artists:

-Jungmin Kim

-Holden Oliphant

Programmers:

-Omar Youssef

-Xuan Liu

Sound Designers:

-Olee Banerjee
